title: How to Make a Bellini Cocktail

steps.headline: Take your peaches, remove the stones, and cut the peaches into small pieces and blend at high speed until puréed.
Put 20ml or 4 teaspoons of peach purée into the champagne glass.
Slowly top up the glass with champagne, stopping to wait for the bubbles to settle.
steps.description: When the glass is about three quarters full, vigorously stir the drink with the bar spoon. Then fill the rest of the glass with champagne.

text: Take your peaches, remove the stones, and cut the peaches into small pieces and blend at high speed until puréed.  Put 20ml or 4 teaspoons of peach purée into the champagne glass.  Slowly top up the glass with champagne, stopping to wait for the bubbles to settle. When the glass is about three quarters full, vigorously stir the drink with the bar spoon. Then fill the rest of the glass with champagne. Finished.
